TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCellsCollectionEditor extends System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for editing the collection of cells in a table row.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the `TableCellsCollectionEditor` class and the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> class (the collection editor's base class) with a custom `TestCells` property.
[!code-cs[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.design.w_34_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.design.w_34_1.vb)]

Docs.param: The type of the collection to edit.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool CanSelectMultipleInstances() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates whether multiple table cells can be selected at the same time.
Docs.returns: if multiple cells can be selected at the same time; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object CreateInstance(class System.Type itemType) cil managed
